sentences.sentence: Viewers thought of “Uncle Walter”, with his greying sideburns and sad, pale eyes, as calmness itself.
sentences.translation: 一想起“沃尔特大叔”（美国人对他的爱称），他深色的鬓角，忧郁而暗淡的眼神，就会浮现眼前，就如他的爱称一样，样子充满镇定。

sentences.sentence: The line should be continuously straight all around the head, behind the ears, at the hairline and on sideburns.
sentences.translation: 这条线应该是环绕脑袋的一条直线，包括耳后、发际线和鬓角部位。

sentences.sentence: Marvelous moustaches and swashbuckling sideburns packed out this year’s Alpine Beard Festival in Chur, Switzerland.
sentences.translation: 在今年瑞士科尔举行的阿尔卑斯“美髯大会”上，随处可见那些奇奇怪怪的小胡子和神气活现的鬓角胡须。
